name: create-react-prime
description: Installs the latest version of React-Prime boilerplate.
author: Sander Vispoel <contact@sandervispoel.com>

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/; tsc; cp src/main dist/src
scripts.dev: rm -rf testingname/ testing-name/; npm run build; node -r ./tsconfig-paths-bootstrap.js dist/src/main testing-name
scripts.test:full: npm run lint; npm run typecheck; mocha
scripts.pub:patch: npm run build; npm version patch; npm publish
scripts.pub:minor: npm run build; npm version minor; npm publish
scripts.pub:major: npm run build; npm version major; npm publish
